text: Two people are now confirmed dead after natural gas explosion that destroyed three row houses in Baltimore and sent seven people to the hospital. https://t.co/7KtteQA2gZ https://t.co/QDLRYENkBJ

name: ABC
text: In statement following selection as Joe Biden's running mate, Kamala Harris says, "I'm honored to join him as our party's nominee for Vice President, and do what it takes to make him our Commander-in-Chief." https://t.co/EvkIjvle4J https://t.co/TMLXT6vnyy

name: ABC
text: Smoke is seen billowing from the Grizzly Creek Fire burning in western Colorado, where flames spread so fast that Interstate 70 had to be shut in both directions. https://t.co/kiANOx4X9u https://t.co/dYjPHVIpPB
